title: Ancient Rune Discovery
text: The runes pulse with a faint magical energy. They seem to tell a story of ages past. What do you do?

title: Hidden Treasure Cache
text: Someone has hidden a collection of valuable items here. The cache is secured with a simple lock.

title: Mystical Spring
text: The water here glows with an otherworldly light. It seems to have magical properties.

title: Forgotten Shrine
text: This shrine has been forgotten by time but still radiates a sense of reverence and mystery.

title: Crystal Formation
text: These crystals hum with magical energy. They appear to be growing naturally from the rock.
